info.title: TOC CapabilityStatement
info.description:
This Section describes the expected capabilities of the PACIO Transitions of Care (TOC) Server actor which is responsible for providing responses to the queries submitted by the TOC Requestors. 

The TOC information is conveyed via a Bundle.

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

/Bundle.summary: Manager for resources of type Bundle
/Bundle.description: The Manager for resources of type Bundle: provides services to manage the collection of all the Bundle instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Bundle based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: composition
parameters.description: The first resource in the bundle, if the bundle type is "document" - this is a composition, and this parameter provides access to search its contents

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Persistent identifier for the bundle

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: When the bundle was assembled

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: document | message | transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | history | searchset | collection

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

parameters.name: _at

parameters.name: _list
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that are referenced in the specified list (current list references are allowed)

/Patient.summary: Manager for resources of type Patient
/Patient.description: The Manager for resources of type Patient: provides services to manage the collection of all the Patient instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Patient based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description:
**Logical id of this artifact**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether the patient record is active

parameters.name: address
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
* [Person](person.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A city specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A city specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A city specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A city specified in an address

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A country specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A country specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A country specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A country specified in an address

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A postalCode specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A postal code specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A postalCode specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A postal code specified in an address

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A state specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A state specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A state specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A state specified in an address

parameters.name: address-use
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A use code specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A use code specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A use code specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A use code specified in an address

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/SearchParameter-us-core-patient-birthdate.html

parameters.name: death-date
parameters.description: The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

parameters.name: deceased
parameters.description: This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered

parameters.name: email
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A value in an email contact
* [Person](person.html): A value in an email contact
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A value in an email contact
* [PractitionerRole](practitionerrole.html): A value in an email contact
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A value in an email contact

parameters.name: family
parameters.description:
**A portion of the family name of the patient**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description:
**Gender of the patient**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

parameters.name: general-practitioner
parameters.description: Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

parameters.name: given
parameters.description:
**A portion of the given name of the patient**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description:
**A patient identifier**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (irrespective of use value)

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: All patients linked to the given patient

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
**A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization that is the custodian of the patient record

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A value in a phone contact
* [Person](person.html): A value in a phone contact
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A value in a phone contact
* [PractitionerRole](practitionerrole.html): A value in a phone contact
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
* [Person](person.html): A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: telecom
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient
* [Person](person.html): The value in any kind of contact
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): The value in any kind of contact
* [PractitionerRole](practitionerrole.html): The value in any kind of contact
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): The value in any kind of contact

parameters.name: race
parameters.description: Returns patients with a race extension matching the specified code.

parameters.name: ethnicity
parameters.description: Returns patients with an ethnicity extension matching the specified code.

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
